text: PCY-Algorithm (for pairs) « Fill left over main memory with a hash table (integer array). « The buckets correspond to integers (counts). « Use as many buckets as possible for the table. + Hash pairs of items to buckets. During pass 1 of A-Priori: « Also initialise hash table / array with all zeros. + Beside counting all singleton itemsets, also generate all pairs, BUT instead of storing them: hash them and increase count of bucket to which they hash by 1.
